knimeNode.name: Multi Selection QuickForm (legacy)
knimeNode.shortDescription: Defines a list of options and allows to select multiple values, which are returned in a table and as a comma-separated variable.

intro.p: Defines a list of options and allows to select multiple values, which are returned in a table and as a variable. The selection can also be controlled from a quickfrom (WebPortal).

fullDescription.option: A descriptive label that will be shown in, for instance the web port.
Some lines of description that will be shown in the remote control form, for instance by means of a tooltip.

A weight value that influences the position of the component in the final layout. Lighter elements will be placed at the top, whereas heavier items will be placed nearer the bottom. The value is relative to the weights of the other components in the workflow (absolute value is not relevant, only the relative comparison to other elements).
Column name to be used for the output table with the selected options.
Choices to be added and removed and selected as pre-selected default values.
Use this text box to enter all possible options for selection.
Mark all items selected by default; list can still be changed.
Option to use a small UI component for selection of choices.

ports.outPort: A table with one column and selected values.
